coverage_details.organ_transplant: Live & artificial organ transplant (heart, kidney, liver, bone, marrow, joint replacement including Knee) covered up to annual limit
coverage_details.dental_general: Scaling twice a year, crowns and bridges covered up to 2000 SR, Artificial Limbs & Prosthesis & Medical Equipment's are covered
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit, Covers both life & non-life threatening congenital illness
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00; Frames & contact lenses covered up to limit, unlimited count; Optical benefit covered for all ages
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services except for outpatient services having limits.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Cover Hajj & Flu and other seasonal vaccinations. Artificial Limbs, Prosthesis, Medical Equipment and all prescribed lab tests are covered. Cover for diabetes devices, blood pressure monitors, sugar reading devices including Free Style Libre with supplies. Cover for Psoriasis test and medications, allergy tests & medicines, vitamins/herbal medications if medically needed and SFDA registered. Pre-existing conditions and chronic illnesses covered. Coverage for diabetic strips, durable equipment, cochlea + battery. Caesarian covered to max limit.

coverage_details.organ_transplant: Live & artificial organ transplant (heart, kidney, liver, bone, marrow, joint replacement including Knee) covered up to annual limit
coverage_details.dental_general: Scaling twice a year, crowns and bridges covered up to 2000 SR, Artificial Limbs & Prosthesis & Medical Equipment's are covered
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit, Covers both life & non-life threatening congenital illness
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00; Frames & contact lenses covered up to limit, unlimited count; Optical benefit covered for all ages
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorization required for class VVIP, VVIP -D, VIP+ and VIP - D+.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Cover Hajj & Flu and other seasonal vaccinations. Artificial Limbs, Prosthesis, Medical Equipment, all prescribed lab tests are covered. Cover for diabetes devices, blood pressure monitors, sugar reading devices including Free Style Libre with supplies. Cover for psoriasis test and medications, allergy tests & medicines, vitamins/herbal medications if medically needed and SFDA registered. Pre-existing conditions and chronic illnesses covered. Diabetic strips, cochlear devices/battery covered. Caesarian covered to max limit. Optical benefit for all ages. Unlimited prescription glasses and contact lenses to optical limit.
